LanguageData.HospitalitySpa_VendingMachineToggleDesc: Allow guests to use this facility.
LanguageData.HospitalitySpa_EmptyAfterHours: Collect money at the facilities after X hours
LanguageData.HospitalitySpa_EmptyAfterHoursTooltip: If money at the facilities has not been collected after this number of hours, somebody will need to come and do it.
